altername_name: Amibee: The Kidnapping of Lady Akiko
name: Gunbee F-99: The Kidnapping of Lady Akiko
overview: GunBee F-99 was an unlicensed port of Detana!! TwinBee for the Amiga, published by APC&TCP and developed by Twin Eagles Group. There are two modes: Honey Mode, which served as a training mode, and Story Mode, which directed to the intro of the story. While the gameplay was based on TwinBee, the intro was similar to the one seen in Turrican 3: Payment Day. Kiara McGuire was a reference to Ben McGuire from the Turrican series.
